alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:34PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Coffee County through 330 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ambrose to 8 miles southwest of Nicholls. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas and Ambrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
